name: Bucket Detective
description: A dark comedy/horror game by Jesse Barksdale, creator of the static speaks my name. Help a cult complete a ritual in exchange for divine inspiration to finish writing your terrible novel. A story-focused experience which takes around 45 minutes to complete.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 and higher Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 940M, Intel HD 5000, or comparable DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Should run on laptops and desktops with decent graphics card made within the past four years
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Desktop GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
